thread.title: Great Hotel & Amazing Staff :)
thread.title_full: Great Hotel & Amazing Staff :) - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ESubasi34
title: Great Hotel & Amazing Staff :)
text: We stayed at Mandarin Oriental over the weekend. Hotel is very conveniently located. Rooms are spacious and very well designed. From the moment we walked in the welcome from all staff members was just incredible. Under the leadership of Charlotte, Sarah (guest relations)Florian, Anne (concierge) & Emilio made our stay a most memorable one by going above and beyond and making us feel as we were home. Big thank you to all the team. We will be coming back.
